transcript.title: PM 92/1962 - Statement by the Prime Minister
transcript.content:
P. M. No. 92/ 1962

The great mass of work requiring my attention as the Session draws to a close makes it impossible for me to make another visit to Perth.

Mr. Hasluck will represent me at the departure of His Royal Highness, and is bearing with him a letter from me explaining the reasons for my inability officially to say farewell to His Royal Highness.

CANBERRA,
29th November, 1962,
